steps.name: API: search the new client by phone
API: assert that the client has been created by comparing name and address

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=3VzpdzwACx, permitAds=true, birthdate=06-04, birthyear=1995, address=2079 Terry Freeway, New Lita, WV 28866, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-02 23:19:57","desc":"WArJFSus5U","sum":1222917628}], phone=["0504-56-80-97"], email=marci.bergnaum@gmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-02 23:19:57","text":"5RUH8tJYWp"}], name=Johnny Gislason IV, gender=female)'

usingRecursiveComparison '- no overridden equals methods were used in the comparison (except for java types)
- these types were compared with the following comparators:
  - java.lang.Double -> DoubleComparator[precision=1.0E-15]
  - java.lang.Float -> FloatComparator[precision=1.0E-6]
  - java.nio.file.Path -> lexicographic comparator (Path natural order)
- actual and expected objects and their fields were compared field by field recursively even if they were not of the same type, this allows for example to compare a Person to a PersonDto (call strictTypeChecking(true) to change that behavior).
'

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=3VzpdzwACx, permitAds=true, birthdate=06-04, birthyear=1995, address=2079 Terry Freeway, New Lita, WV 28866, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-02 23:19:57","desc":"WArJFSus5U","sum":1222917628}], phone=["0504-56-80-97"], email=marci.bergnaum@gmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-02 23:19:57","text":"5RUH8tJYWp"}], name=Johnny Gislason IV, gender=female)'

isEqualTo 'ClientGetResponse(id=3329, name=Johnny Gislason IV, phone=0504568097, profileImage=client_photo-BS_Y.jpg, address=2079 Terry Freeway, New Lita, WV 28866, status=[{"added":"2023-05-02 23:19:57","text":"5RUH8tJYWp"}], permitAds=false, isUnsubscribed=false, lastAppointment=null, phoneCanonical=+972504568097)'
